help.draw: Click on the map to draw the line. Click one more time on end point to finish.
help.select:
Please select layer in TOC and click on the line feature to generate profile.
Selected layer: {layerName}
help.notSupportedLayer: not supported. Please select WMS, WFS or vector layer.

warnings.layerNotSupported: Selected layer is not supported. Please select WMS, WFS or vector layer.
warnings.noFeatureInPoint: Line feature was not found at selected point.
